revised_title: Investigating Anomalous Trichromatism and its Relation to Trichromic Vision
tldr: The author examines 100 women students and identifies 12 anomalous trichromats, 10 red-anomalies, and 2 green-anomalies. They find that these individuals do not have color weakness and are not color-defective, challenging the assumption that anomalous trichromatism is a form of color weakness.
